articles.title: Putin challenges US pressure on India over Russian oil during state visit - Al Jazeera
articles.description: Putin questions US pressure on India’s Russian oil purchases as Modi gives the Russian president a warm welcome.
articles.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin has questioned Washingtons stance on Indias oil purchases from Moscow, pointing to US imports of Russian nuclear fuel as he began a state visit aimed at strengthening… [+3370 chars]
